DOM Physics with Rapier.rs

Simple proof of concept for a fun user interaction. We pretend that elements of the webpage are rectangles in a 2D physics world.

Press the button and let the magic happen.

Built with:

Rapier.rs
Typescript
Webworkers
Vite
Tailwind
DaisyUI

More badges so they fly around!

DaisyUI is pretty cool

You should totally check it out. I love using it for quick mockups like this one.
